sentences.sContent: They said they would press for reciprocity with Greece in the issuing of visas.
sentences.sCn: 他们说，他们将会对希腊施压，以达成签证发放的互惠。

synos.tran: 相互作用（复数reciprocities）；[数]相互性；互惠主义

trans.tranCn: 互惠， 互助； 互惠主义
trans.tranOther: a situation in which two people, groups, or countries give each other similar kinds of help or special rights
